data.title: Hows this guy doing Â« XJMR
data.text:
Everything coauthored. "tracking the slowdown in GDP" is little more than a moving average, crazy it's published in RESTat.

JMP is meh. Paper with Tenreyro is meh. Didn't we already know commodity prices matter for commodity exporters?

Don't get me wrong -- it's an impressive publication record though for a PhD student! I don't see anything bad there, but given what I see his actually publication record is quite fortunate.

Everything coauthored. "tracking the slowdown in GDP" is little more than a moving average, crazy it's published in RESTat.

JMP is meh. Paper with Tenreyro is meh. Didn't we already know commodity prices matter for commodity exporters?

Don't get me wrong -- it's an impressive publication record though for a PhD student! I don't see anything bad there, but given what I see his actually publication record is quite fortunate.

You can be lucky and roll into a top pub with advisor. This guy has 3 pubs in three different top fields with three different sets of coauthors. That's not luck.
